sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-main>
        <v-form>
            <v-container>
                <v-row>
                    <v-col
                        cols="12"
                        md="4"
                    >
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="login"
                            :counter="10"
                            label="login"
                            required
                            hide-details
                        ></v-text-field>
                    </v-col>

                    <v-col
                    cols="12"
                    md="4"
                    >
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="password"
                        label="password"
                        hide-details
                        required
                    ></v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                </v-row>
            <v-row>
                <v-btn type="submit" block class="mt-2">Login</v-btn>
            </v-row>
            </v-container>
        </v-form>
    </v-main>
</template>

<script setup>

import { reactive } from 'vue'
import { useUsuarioStore } from "../../store/user"

const store = useUsuarioStore()

let login = ''
let password = ''

const nameRules = [
    value => {
        if (value) return true

        return 'Name is required.'
    },
    value => {
        if (value?.length <= 10) return true

        return 'Name must be less than 10 characters.'
    },
]
let email = ''
const emailRules = [
    value => {
        if (value) return true

        return 'E-mail is requred.'
    },
    value => {
        if (/.+@.+\..+/.test(value)) return true

        return 'E-mail must be valid.'
    },
]


function userLogin() {
    const dados = reactive({
        login: login,
        password: password,
    })  
    
    store.login(dados);
}
</script>
